title: #Daydream: Aruba
text: Pin it Send We know how it is. You’re stuck at your desk and the day seems to be going on forever. Your mind starts to wander — at first to “anywhere but here,” but then to exotic, faraway lands where your everyday problems and stress melt in the presence of true paradise. You want to go to there, and we want to go with you. Every day at 3 p.m. Eastern, we’ll send you a picture of the place we at Yahoo Travel are daydreaming about so we can all take that mental vacation together. Let’s go to… Photo: Salvatore Freni Jr /Flickr …ARUBA!!!! Happy Friday, daydreamers! Today, we just want to daydream about relaxing in the caribbean. The cozy little hammock pictured above, surrounded by turquoise waters and blue sunny skies is the perfect place to do just that! You can work on your tan while sipping frosty libations. Go for a swim in the perfect waters of the Caribbean. And of course nosh on the exceptional über-fresh seafood Aruba has to offer. Straight-from-the-sea mahi mahi tacos anyone? YES, please. Now back to my tan….
